data.title: Aishwarya-Abhishek Divorce Rumors Resurface Again

data.text:
Social Media Follow ButtonsFollow on WhatsApp

The Bachchan family always remains in the news for one reason or another. For the past few months, there have been rumors about the relationship between Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan. These rumors have been fueled by various reasons. The discussions have once again emphasized that their divorce is certain. The occasion was first the visit to Kashi Vishwanath and then the wedding ceremony of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.

Abhishek Bachchan along with his mother Jaya Bachchan and sister Shweta Bachchan Nanda went to Varanasi on Thursday, July 11, 2024. There, they visited Kashi Vishwanath and performed puja-archana, but this time his wife Aishwarya and daughter Aaradhya were not present.

Not only that, but the entire Bachchan family gathered at the much-talked-about wedding ceremony of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Mumbai on Friday, July 12, 2024, but daughter-in-law Aishwarya and granddaughter Aaradhya were not seen.

The entire Bachchan family – Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bachchan, son Abhishek Bachchan, daughter Shweta Nanda Bachchan, granddaughter Navya Nanda, grandson Agastya Nanda and son-in-law Nikhil Nanda were seen in one frame at the wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. In the same ceremony, Aishwarya Rai enters separately with her daughter Aaradhya after a while.

So is there any rift between the Bachchan family and Aishwarya? This is the question that fans are thinking about. Fans are speculating that Abhishek and Aishwarya’s divorce is almost certain due to these two incidents.

Netizens were also surprised not to see Aishwarya with the Bachchan family. Netizens have raised many questions about the presence. One user wrote, ‘Where are Aishwarya and her daughter? This is not good’. One user wrote, ‘They have separated Aishwarya and Aaradhya.’ Another user commented that ‘Aishwarya is missing, the family is incomplete without her.’
